citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 am to
10:55 am on 03/25/2015. Phone calls attempted but not successful-not able to leave voice mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 am to
10:55 am on 03/25/2015.  Phone calls attempted but not successful-not able to leave voice mail.
